UPDATE: Alright, so maybe my computer was having problems that same night. This game should be A-OK to download, folks.
Don't thumbs it down just because you don't know how to install games properly.

@ telep_man: I have an ATI Radeon HD 3200 graphics card, with an AMD Athlon II X4 610e Processor (2.40GHz). If your computer seems anything reasonably equal to mine, you should be good to go. Just check for updates on your graphics or DirectX.
